p:
The nutritional quality and the potential of oils to prevent diseases can be evaluated by five factors: atherogenic index (AI), thrombogenic index (TI), hypocholesterolemic: hypercholesterolemic ratio (HH), polyunsaturated fatty acids: saturated fatty acids (PUFA:SFA) and the ω 6:ω 3 ratio, which are calculated from the fatty acids in the oils. AI, TI and H:H are used as predictor factors for cardiovascular disease.
3
